body_html: Can you please open the same issue but in a torchvision package? This can't be done in DataLoader because it's not specific to images nor even to loading files from disk, but FolderDataset could raise a nicer error message. Thanks!
body_text: Can you please open the same issue but in a torchvision package? This can't be done in DataLoader because it's not specific to images nor even to loading files from disk, but FolderDataset could raise a nicer error message. Thanks!
body: Can you please open the same issue but in a torchvision package? This can't be done in DataLoader because it's not specific to images nor even to loading files from disk, but `FolderDataset` could raise a nicer error message. Thanks!
